system.novice: Navigator warps space within range, ships wishing to enter or exit within this range suffer -10 to Pilot (Space Craft) Skill Tests per Degree of Success on Navigator's Willpower Test. Ships that fail take 1 Hull Damage that cannot be reduced by Void Shields or Armour.
system.adept: Range becomes 2 VU x Willpower Bonus. Vessels that fail Pilot Skill Test take 1d5 damage that can't be reduced by Shields or Armour.
system.master: Vessels that fail Pilot Skill Test take 1d5 damage + 1 per Degree of Success on Navigator's Willpower Test. Can't be reduced by Shields or Armour.

description.value:
Novice: Navigator warps space within range, ships wishing to enter or exit within this range suffer -10 to Pilot (Space Craft) Skill Tests per Degree of Success on Navigator's Willpower Test. Ships that fail take 1 Hull Damage that cannot be reduced by Void Shields or Armour.

Adept: Range becomes 2 VU x Willpower Bonus. Vessels that fail Pilot Skill Test take 1d5 damage that can't be reduced by Shields or Armour.

Master: Vessels that fail Pilot Skill Test take 1d5 damage + 1 per Degree of Success on Navigator's Willpower Test. Can't be reduced by Shields or Armour.
